testimonials.message: I made a birthday video for my friend, she loved it and it was perfect. Thanks a lot:) I love it!!
testimonials.name: Sirsa

testimonials.message: I am really happy with how Picovico helped me create a fantastic video gift for my sister’s birthday. I loved it and so did my sister. Thank you team Picovico for your service.
testimonials.name: Harmony Barre

testimonials.message: I decided to make a short movie for my Boyfriends’ 30th Birthday. In the search for an online solution I found PICOVICO. They offered exactly what i was searching for: awesome video template along with music options. My boyfriend and his family were very happy to get this present!
testimonials.name: Valeria Tereshenkova
